title: So why do people think aliens don't exist???
body:
I can't understand it at all.  

I mean I get the whole "If there were aliens then they would show themselves already!" thing but at the same time I don't.

If I was an alien and just observing Earth for even two days I wouldn't want to reveal myself.  Humans would look like stupid warmongers to me.  I would either wait for them to destroy themselves and then take over Earth or I would destroy the majority of them and keep a small amount for experiments and what not.

I just don't understand how anyone could think we are all alone.  I mean the universe is huge.  How the hell can we be the only things out there. And the whole "even if we did find them they would be micro organisms" thing is kinda far out for me.  It just shows how self centered and cocky humanity is.  I believe we are very low on the totem pole. ;c

In another 500 years (if we make it that long) we will be laughing at the stuff we consider 'fact' just like we do at the people that thought the world was flat or thought the sun revolved around the earth.

Sometimes I think that religion is just different alien species trying to fuck around with humanity. I mean, who wouldn't want to play god? (Not a religion thread just a thought)

This has all come from me playing The Sims soz.

Que X Files music!
